thread.title: Why Winter is the Best Time to Visit Wine Country
thread.title_full: Why Winter is the Best Time to Visit Wine Country - WSJ

author: Lettie Teague
title: Why Winter is the Best Time to Visit Wine Country
text:
WHEN OENOPHILES TALK about wine-country travel, theyâ€™re inevitably referencing trips taken in the spring, summer or fall. No wine lover I know has ever rhapsodized over a week spent crawling around damp Bordeaux cellars in mid-February or driving through Piedmont in a dense winter fog.

For most casual drinkers, wine-country travel presumes abundant sunshine, mild temperatures, picnics at wineries and perhaps a dip in the hotel pool. Of course it also means crowded restaurants and even more crowded tasting rooms and...
